name: News Abuse
description:
BREAKING NEWS: FALSEHOOD AND FACT ARE NOW A MATTER OF OPINION

In News Abuse the person who decides which 'facts' are published is you.

How to play:

- Left Mouse: select lead / assign lead to writer / hire writer

- Right Mouse: fire writer

- Spacebar: start game / begin daily news cycle

- 'M' key: enable/disable music

- F4: toggle fullscreen

Note: left-click and drag articles off-screen to clear them from the site. Dragging the mouse over several articles will cause them to stack. Be careful to not accidentally clear articles that are still pulling in page views! Letter from the editor

Thanks for checking out my game! This management-sim was produced in 48 Hours for PTBO Game Jam 02. There's still some work to be done on it before it's really a true game, but here it is as it was upon the completion of the jam, with the exceptions of a few typos having been fixed! For a greater insight on how to play, check out the help page at the start of the game. Keep in mind that there are balance issues due to the short development time, but please offer any critiques or suggestions in the comments!

While you're at it, why not follow me on twitter?

Cheers!

esarkis
